content:
{
    "source_filename": "AudioRecorder.yaml",
    "metadata": {},
    "content": "# This file is automatically generated. Please don't edit it manually.
# To submit a bug report on the content, see
# https://devforum.roblox.com/c/bug-reports/documentation-issues/72

name: AudioRecorder
type: class
memory_category: Internal
summary: |
  Records audio streams in-experience.
description: |
  **This API is in development and is not available yet.**

  `AudioRecorder` records audio streams in-experience with a fixed time limit of
  60 seconds. The results can be loaded into an `Class.AudioPlayer` for
  playback.

  At this time, `Class.AudioDeviceInput` cannot be recorded. The
  `Class.AudioRecorder:GetUnrecordableInstancesAsync()|GetUnrecordableInstancesAsync()`
  method can be used to check specifically which instances aren't recordable.
code_samples:
  - audio-recorder
inherits:
  - Instance
descendants: []
tags:
  - NotBrowsable
deprecation_message: ''
properties:
  - name: AudioRecorder.IsRecording
    summary: ''
    description: |
      Returns whether the `AudioRecorder` is currently recording.
    code_samples: []
    type: boolean
    tags: []
    deprecation_message: ''
    security:
      read: None
      write: RobloxEngineSecurity
    thread_safety: ReadSafe
    category: State
    serialization:
      can_load: true
      can_save: true
    capabilities:
      - Audio
  - name: AudioRecorder.TimeLength
    summary: ''
    description: |
      Returns the current length of the recording in seconds.
    code_samples: []
    type: double
    tags:
      - ReadOnly
      - NotReplicated
    deprecation_message: ''
    security:
      read: None
      write: None
    thread_safety: ReadSafe
    category: Data
    serialization:
      can_load: false
      can_save: true
    capabilities:
      - Audio
methods:
  - name: AudioRecorder:CanRecordAsync
    summary: ''
    description: |
      Returns whether the `AudioRecorder` can currently record. For instance,
      this will return `false` if the current recording data has reached the
      recording time limit. To clear the recording, use
      `Class.AudioRecorder:Clear()|Clear()`.
    code_samples: []
    parameters: []
    returns:
      - type: boolean
        summary: ''
    tags:
      - Yields
    deprecation_message: ''
    security: None
    thread_safety: Unsafe
    capabilities:
      - Audio
  - name: AudioRecorder:Clear
    summary: ''
    description: |
      Clears out the recording from the `AudioRecorder`.
    code_samples: []
    parameters: []
    returns:
      - type: ()
        summary: ''
    tags: []
    deprecation_message: ''
    security: None
    thread_safety: Unsafe
    capabilities:
      - Audio
  - name: AudioRecorder:GetConnectedWires
    summary: |
      Returns an array of `Class.Wire|Wires` that are connected to the specified
      pin.
    description: |
      Returns an array of `Class.Wire|Wires` that are connected to the specified
      pin. `Class.AudioRecorder` has one "Input" pin.
    code_samples: []
    parameters:
      - name: pin
        type: string
        default:
        summary: |
          An input or output pin on this instance
    returns:
      - type: Instances
        summary: |
          An array of `Class.Wire|Wires`
    tags: []
    deprecation_message: ''
    security: None
    thread_safety: Unsafe
    capabilities:
      - Audio
  - name: AudioRecorder:GetInputPins
    summary: |
      Gets the list of pins that `Class.Wire` can use in `Class.Wire.TargetName`
      to connect to this instance via its `Class.Wire.TargetInstance` property.
    description: |
      Gets the list of pins that `Class.Wire` can use in `Class.Wire.TargetName`
      to connect to this instance via its `Class.Wire.TargetInstance` property.

      For `Class.AudioRecorder`, this is `Input` only.
    code_samples: []
    parameters: []
    returns:
      - type: Array
        summary: |
          An array of strings representing valid pin names.
    tags: []
    deprecation_message: ''
    security: None
    thread_safety: Unsafe
    capabilities:
      - Audio
  - name: AudioRecorder:GetOutputPins
    summary: |
      Gets the list of pins that `Class.Wire` can use in `Class.Wire.SourceName`
      to connect to this instance via its `Class.Wire.SourceInstance` property.
    description: |
      Gets the list of pins that `Class.Wire` can use in `Class.Wire.SourceName`
      to connect to this instance via its `Class.Wire.SourceInstance` property.

      For `Class.AudioRecorder`, there are none.
    code_samples: []
    parameters: []
    returns:
      - type: Array
        summary: |
          An array of strings representing valid pin names.
    tags: []
    deprecation_message: ''
    security: None
    thread_safety: Unsafe
    capabilities:
      - Audio
  - name: AudioRecorder:GetTemporaryContent
    summary: ''
    description: |
      Returns recorded content that can be played back with `Class.AudioPlayer`.
      The content retrieved from this method is only valid in the current
      session.
    code_samples: []
    parameters: []
    returns:
      - type: Content
        summary: ''
    tags: []
    deprecation_message: ''
    security: None
    thread_safety: Unsafe
    capabilities:
      - Audio
  - name: AudioRecorder:GetUnrecordableInstancesAsync
    summary: ''
    description: |
      Traverses the audio graph, starting from this recorder's inputs, to find
      unrecordable instances. Currently, `Class.AudioDeviceInput` is not
      recordable.
    code_samples: []
    parameters: []
    returns:
      - type: Instances
        summary: ''
    tags:
      - Yields
    deprecation_message: ''
    security: None
    thread_safety: Unsafe
    capabilities:
      - Audio
  - name: AudioRecorder:RecordAsync
    summary: ''
    description: |
      If `Class.AudioRecorder:CanRecordAsync()|CanRecordAsync()` returns `true`,
      recording begins. If recording cannot begin, this method produces an
      error.
    code_samples: []
    parameters: []
    returns:
      - type: ()
        summary: ''
    tags:
      - Yields
    deprecation_message: ''
    security: None
    thread_safety: Unsafe
    capabilities:
      - Audio
  - name: AudioRecorder:Stop
    summary: ''
    description: |
      Stops recording.
    code_samples: []
    parameters: []
    returns:
      - type: ()
        summary: ''
    tags: []
    deprecation_message: ''
    security: None
    thread_safety: Unsafe
    capabilities:
      - Audio
events:
  - name: AudioRecorder.WiringChanged
    summary: |
      Fires when another instance is connected to or disconnected from the
      `Class.AudioAnalyzer` via a `Class.Wire`.
    description: |
      Event that fires after a `Class.Wire` becomes connected or disconnected,
      and that `Class.Wire` is now or was previously connected to a pin on the
      `Class.AudioRecorder` and to some other wirable instance.
    code_samples: []
    parameters:
      - name: connected
        type: boolean
        default:
        summary: |
          Whether the instance got connected or disconnected.
      - name: pin
        type: string
        default:
        summary: |
          The pin on the `Class.AudioAnalyzer` that the `Class.Wire` targets.
      - name: wire
        type: Wire
        default:
        summary: |
          The `Class.Wire` between the `Class.AudioAnalyzer` and the other
          instance.
      - name: instance
        type: Instance
        default:
        summary: |
          The other instance that is or was connected through the `Class.Wire`.
    tags: []
    deprecation_message: ''
    security: None
    capabilities:
      - Audio
callbacks: []"
}
